special_instruction: Please make it less spicy than usual, add extra raita on the side, and ensure the rice is well-cooked and fluffy.
Serve with fresh lemon wedges, add a small portion of garlic butter on top, and make sure it is grilled thoroughly but not burnt.
Add extra cheese slices, do not include onions or pickles, and please toast the buns lightly so they stay crunchy.
Make the sauce creamy with extra mushrooms, serve with garlic bread on the side, and sprinkle a bit of oregano on top before serving.
Cook it well so it is crispy outside but juicy inside, add extra salad on the side, and avoid using too much oil in the marination.
Make the gravy thick and creamy, add a little extra butter on top before serving, and avoid making it too sweet.
Use fresh romaine lettuce, add extra parmesan cheese, keep the croutons crunchy, and serve the dressing on the side.
Spicy level medium, add extra mint chutney, and ensure chicken is tender and rice is fluffy.
Serve with buttered vegetables, avoid overcooking, and garnish with fresh herbs and lemon wedges.
Include extra cheddar, do not add onions or pickles, lightly toast the buns and keep them warm.
Creamy sauce with parmesan cheese, serve warm with garlic bread, sprinkle oregano for taste.
Golden crispy outside, juicy inside, serve with extra salad and light marination.
Thick creamy gravy, extra butter on top, slightly more cream, and avoid making it too sweet.
Extra parmesan cheese, keep croutons crunchy, serve dressing on the side, use fresh lettuce.
Less spicy, add raita on the side, make sure rice and chicken are cooked perfectly.
Grilled perfectly, serve with lemon wedges and butter sauce, ensure fish is moist inside.
Extra cheese, no pickles, lightly toasted buns, serve with ketchup and mustard.
Creamy sauce with extra mushrooms, serve with garlic bread, sprinkle oregano on top.
Crispy outside, juicy inside, extra salad, light oil in marination, serve hot.
Thick gravy, extra butter on top, slightly more cream, avoid making it too sweet, serve warm.
